sentences.english: A lantern on the boulevard cast a vague light into this poor room.
sentences.chinese: 路旁的一盏回光灯微微照着这里的贫苦相。

sentences.english: The great leader emerged from a poor family.
sentences.chinese: 伟大领袖出身于一个贫苦家庭。

sentences.english: The one thing they said was,remember the poor.
sentences.chinese: 但他们曾说过要记挂贫苦者。

sentences.english: The poor farmer has kept my money for two years.
sentences.chinese: 贫苦的农民借我的钱已两年了。

sentences.english: Lotus reincarnation reaches poor Home He, name element daughter.
sentences.chinese: 荷花投胎至贫苦的何家，取名素女。

sentences.english: The use of horese for ploughing still prevails among the poorer farmers.
sentences.chinese: 用马耕作的现象在贫苦农民中仍然十分盛行。

sentences.english: Our class decided to make a contribution to helping some of the poor families in town.
sentences.chinese: 我们班决定捐赠点东西来帮助城里的一些贫苦人家。

sentences.english: She was born in a poor family.
A lazy youth, a lousy age.
Thellos is called cryogenics, and it has its drawbacks.
sentences.chinese: 这就是低温生物科学，当然这措施也有点贫苦。

sentences.english: And I would definitely donate money to the poor people.
sentences.chinese: 我也会把钱捐给那些贫苦的人。

sentences.english: They liked to tell stories about poor rural people living at the edge of dark forests.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢讲那些住在深林边上贫苦农民的故事。

sentences.english: Although living under such poor situation, Confucius 'determined to study' since at the age of 15.
sentences.chinese: 虽然生活贫苦，孔子十五岁即“志于学”。

sentences.english: Although the life is poor, fortunately the feeling of father and son also earnest is deep.
sentences.chinese: 虽然生活贫苦，好在父子的感情倒也笃深。

sentences.english: The grace of her age was still struggling against the hideous, premature decrepitude of debauchery and poverty.
sentences.chinese: 青春的风采也仍在跟堕落与贫苦所招致的老丑作斗争。

sentences.english: He acted as a good Samaritan , and took the poor woman to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他乐施好善，把那个贫苦的妇人送进了医院。

definition: lit. food not filling the stomach (idiom)/fig. poverty-stricken
extreme poverty (idiom); destitute/penniless/poor as church mice
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
